overview.ovdesc:
Application is used to suspend breakdown information for instruments that do not require
performance breakdown facility
Validation Rules

desc.p: The value is set to YES/NO to include or exclude the instrument from performance breakdown. When the flag is set to YES, the instrument is excluded and when it is set to No the instrument is included.
The id should be a valid instrument id. The id can either be a security id or an account id.
The field can either contain ALL or a set of Portfolio ids.
ALL - This option specifies that the instrument restriction applies to all the portfolios.
If the portfolio ids are specified then the instruction restriction is applicable only to the list of portfolios ids.
Valid values are either Portfolio ids or ALL .
